item.title: Don Knuth plays with ChatGPT
item.description: - Donald Knuth asked 20 questions to ChatGPT and received insightful responses on various topics, highlighting the potential of AI language models.

item.title: Show HN: YouTube Full Text Search – Search all of a channel from the commandline
item.description: - yt-fts is a python script that scrapes all a channel's subtitles and loads them into a searchable database accessible from the command line.

item.title: Rooms.xyz
item.description: - Rooms.xyz is a platform that allows users to create and remix interactive rooms from their browser.

item.title: People who die by suicide want to stop suffering, not to stop living
item.description: - Psychologist Enrique Echeburúa has published a book titled "Death by Suicide" that outlines the fundamental aspects of suicide as a public health problem and emphasizes the need to support survivors.

item.title: Writing summaries is more important than reading more books
item.description: - Writing summaries for good books is more important than reading more books.

item.title: FBI Misused Spy Database, FISA Court Says
item.description: - The FBI misused a spy database to search for information on individuals suspected of involvement in the Capitol attack and George Floyd protests.

item.title: We will be shutting down neeva.com
item.description: - Neeva, a search engine startup with an ad-free and privacy-focused approach, will shut down its consumer search product due to challenges in user acquisition and the economic environment.

item.title: Using ChatGPT for home automation
item.description: - A new home automation project was developed that uses ChatGPT plugins to control hardware connected to a Raspberry Pi.

item.title: Axle OS
item.description: - Axle OS is an open-source microkernel and userspace operating system that was started in 2016 and has been worked on periodically since then.

item.title: Counterintuitive Properties of High Dimensional Space (2018)
item.description: - Our intuition for three-dimensional geometry fails us in higher dimensions, where the properties of even simple objects can be counterintuitive.
